snippet: A man who the authorities say set fire to a Corvallis mosque was sentenced on Wednesday to probation.
abstract: Federal judge sentences Cody Crawford to probation for setting fire to mosque in Corvallis, Oregon; prosecutors cited Crawford's mental problems as reason for not recommending prison time.
lead_paragraph: A man who the authorities say set fire to a Corvallis mosque was sentenced on Wednesday to probation.

headline.main: Oregon: Man Gets Probation for Fire at Mosque
headline.print_headline: Oregon: Man Gets Probation for Fire at Mosque
